casebody.data:
UTILITIES COMM.
v.
ATTORNEY GENERAL. No. 196A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. Gary R. Govert, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Margaret A. Force, Assistant Attorney General, for Attorney General. James H. Jeffries, IV, Charlotte, Kim R. Cocklin, Senior Vice President, for Piedmont Natural Gas Co., et al. Gina C. Holt, for Public Staff-Utilities Comm. James P. West, Raleigh, for Carolina Utilities Customers. Mary Lynne Grigg, Craig Collins, for Public Service Co. of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of September 2006 by the Attorney General for Dismissal of Appeal Pursuant to Settlement:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of November 2006."
